item.description:
Let's see a movie grab a bite to eat and explore Patriots place.....

This venue is located at Gillete Stadium and should be fun to explore on a Saturday afternoon.

Ok...lets get "Taken" at Patriots place! You guessed it the movie is Taken and the show starts at 2:50 so we can meet in front of the theater at 2:30. We will have a bite to eat before at Red Robin. If you would like to join us for lunch meet us in front of Red Robin at 1:00.....

http://www.patriot-pl...

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Red Robin....
item.name: Movie and Munchies at Patriots Place
